item.description:
You work long hours. The people you meet in bars all seem to be looking for one thing. Who needs that headache (and the hangover?)

For the price of what you'd spend on a couple of dirty martini with extra olives,
you can meet up to 12 different different members of the opposite sx.

Mingle over cocktails and soft music, then have up to 12 five minute brief encounters with possible matches.
You could walk in with a calendar ready to be filled with dates and leave with several new possibilities.
Now that's what I call a happy hour.


PRE-PAYMENT ONLY, PLEASE.
PAYMENT POLICY:
$30
$23 for groups of 2 or more
$20 if you register with a member of the opposite sex
REGISTER AND PAY HERE:
http://bostonmoxieint...

PRE-PAYMENT ONLY, PLEASE.


HOW IT WORKS:
*Mingle from 6:-6:45pm. Relax, grab a drink and get to know other daters.
*Around 6:45. you`ll be directed to your first table and you`ll start your dating rounds.
*Five minutes goes by in a flash! Before you know it, you`ll be on your last date.
*Make a check next to the names of people you wish to hear from after each date.
*Event Managers will come by, after each round, and collect your card.
*We`ll compare them to your date`s.
*If you and your date both chose to stay in touch with each other, their contact info will be e-mailed tO you within 48 hours.

THINGS TO KNOW:
*Rounds last 5 minutes each
*There will be a minimum of 7 rounds and a maximum of 12 rounds, depending on start time
*Match e-mails go out 48 hours after the event
*If you`re 2-3 years older or younger than the age range, you`re still able to attend.
*We do not take cash at the door for these events


PRE-PAYMENT ONLY, PLEASE.

WILL THERE BE AN EQUAL NUMBER OF MEN & WOMEN?
That`s the goal. You can be sure that we would not hold this event unless we could guarantee at least 7 dates for each person.

group.name: Boston New In Town Meetup Group

item.name: Dating Outside The Box - SpeedDating Ages 32-42 - 1male/ 1 female spot left
